headline: Citizens Reiterates Market Outperform Rating on Booking Holdings (BKNG), Maintains $6,500 PT
summary: Booking Holdings Inc. (NASDAQ:BKNG) is one of the stocks to buy according to billionaire Ray Dalio’s Bridgewater Associates. On October 7, Citizens reiterated its “Market Outperform” rating on Booking Holdings Inc. (NASDAQ:BKNG) stock and maintained the $6,500 price target. The analysts highlighted Booking Holdings’ competitive strengths, including its broad diversification, strong global brand, and extensive […]
